item.description:
Our next meeting is upon us:

In addition to the now customary book raffle (thanks again to O'Reilly and Focal Press) and opportunities to meet your fellow computer musikers, we're introducing two new features:

Lightning Talks
Quick 5-10 minute presentations/demos of your favorite tools and plugins (preferably free ones). Currently, on the agenda:

  • Melohman PE (Yev)
  • Kore Player (Luke)
  • UVI Soundbank (Yev)
  • Kjaerhus Auto Filter, SpitFish, Other Audio FX (Yev)


Still plenty of room for speakers! Please step up. No presentation experience is needed and our audience is really nice! :-)

Making The Track (Feature Presentation)
Composer, producer, and engineer Eric Hodge (Innerfuze) will take us through all the steps of creating a song. From beat production, recording and tracking with softsynths, to processing, mixing, and mastering. Check out Eric's music at www.innerfuze.com and his local Boston-based label Vermin Street.


Finally, please get in touch with me (the sooner the better) if you'd like to share some of your music at the meetup. We welcome both completed projects and works in progress on which you'd like to get feedback.

Like last time, we'll be meeting at the Bocoup Loft. The doors will open at 6:30 PM. The presentations will start at 7.

See you then!
item.name: The Lightning-Talking, Track-Making, Book-Raffling Palooza!
